description:
Take your first steps off the ground with confidence. This slackline is great for kids or beginners learning to walk the line. It's wide and has a rubberized texture for grip. Includes a separate help line to allow you to hang on, which acts like training wheels as you find your balance.

  • Includes tree protection, help line, ratchet with safety lock, 2.4m of webbing and a reinforced anchor/tension loop
  • Handle grip is soft plastic for comfortable and efficient tensioning
  • Ratchet release is rubberized for easy and safe release of the tension on the line
  • Width is 50mm
  • Max user weight: 136kg (300lbs)
  • True length measurement refers to usable line length and doesn't include the webbing used by the ratchet
name: Slackline Industries Play Line Slackline
